1.content: ok now choose the world and your partner, but remember everyone is going to vestroia so there would be 3 pairs
1.title: teleportation

114.content:
You felt a chilly breeze from somewhere. And suddenly you realised that you were in a world covered in ice.
-Owwwww... Chilly! you thought. Then you heard a moan close by.
-Oh, my poor bones! - It was Marina. - I think I broke my arm!!!
-No, ypu are ok! - a voice emanated from somewhere. Then you saw them. One was pale with green hair. Another was sitting on a huge fish.
-Im Hairaidee - the one with green hair said.
-And Im Taghen! one on fish said. We are bakugan with mixed attributes. If you defeat us we will help you battle your headmaster.
114.title: Marina

12.content: Whom are you going with?
12.title: Subterra-Chaos world

13.content: So you wont be alone
13.title: Pyros-Darkus world

info.brief_description: Go on adventure to ALTERED (mixed) Vestroia!
info.description:
Your school headmaster, Luba, wants to claim Orbs that kept Vestroia in balance, so, Altered Vestroia took place to be. Kick your headmaster butt!

You are Nikita, your attribute is Darkus and your bakugan is Blackusurp (pitch black humanoid creature with shining red eyes, clad in armor of cosmic steel.
Your partners

Your granny Nina user of Pyros. Fortress is her partner
Your friend Marina, user of Aquos with her Preyas
Sirengasha (boy) uses Chaos. A true hand with Terrorclaw
Miha, Sirengasha's lil bro. Ventus master. Serpenoid is his Bakugan
Katya, user of Subterra. She uses Stinglash
There are 3 altered dimensions... Now all is in your hands!
